languages.text: "Может, оно и к лучшему. Династии нужен Вольный Торговец, не похожий на уголек".
"You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."
languages.original_text: "Может, оно и к лучшему. Династии нужен Вольный Торговец, не похожий на уголек".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps it is for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader and not a charred piece of ember."
"Perhaps it is for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader and not a charred piece of ember."
"Perhaps it is for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."

languages.text: «¿Sabe? Creo que será lo mejor. La dinastía necesita un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, no carbonilla».
languages.original_text: "You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe? Creo que será lo mejor. La dinastía necesita un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, no carbonilla».

languages.text: 「それが最善かもしれない。王朝に必要なのはローグトレーダーです。炭化した燃えかすではない」
languages.original_text: "You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."

traits.locale_text: 「それが最善かもしれない。王朝に必要なのはローグトレーダーです。炭化した燃えかすではない」

languages.text: “老实说，说不定这才是最明智的决定。这个王朝需要的是行商浪人，不是被烧焦的人干。”
languages.original_text: "You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，说不定这才是最明智的决定。这个王朝需要的是行商浪人，不是被烧焦的人干。”

languages.text: "Vielleicht wäre das wirklich das Beste. Die Dynastie braucht {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}, kein verkohltes Stück Asche."
languages.original_text: "You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht wäre das wirklich das Beste. Die Dynastie braucht {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}, kein verkohltes Stück Asche."

languages.text: « Réflexion faite, c'est peut-être mieux ainsi. La dynastie a besoin d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, pas d'un morceau de charbon calciné. »
languages.original_text: "You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."

traits.locale_text: « Réflexion faite, c'est peut-être mieux ainsi. La dynastie a besoin d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, pas d'un morceau de charbon calciné. »

languages.text: "Aslında bu en iyisi olabilir. Hanedanlığın bir Hür Tacir'e ihtiyacı var, kapkara bir köz parçasına değil."
languages.original_text: "You know, that might be for the best. The dynasty needs a Rogue Trader, not a charred piece of ember."
